attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i wasnt sure how to get help but a friend of mine from the uk is in trouble hes held prisoner in nigeria, his name is owen pirlo moore, hes 42, a dr david obazee emailed me to make contact on 002348080303675, i spoke to owen, hes had his luggage stolen, hecant get out of nigeria hospital tillhes paid for thier services, hes been drugged many times, he had his hand smashed up, you can contact me 006467515562 my name is beverley coster, hes been in hospital since around 20th december, please help owen

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
